column5: Absolutely gorgeous 2 bedroom condo in a gated community the Med Center. Full privacy, you have the condo all to your self. Approximately a mile from NRG stadium and the Med Center. Walking distance to Metro rail. Very tastefully furnished with contemporary furniture. Cable available. Fast internet. Access to Tennis court, swimming pool and club house.
column8: 2 BR private condo - close to the Med Center/NRG
